skills.name: Wind of Thrymheim
skills.description: [SP: 4][CD: 22s] Large AOE ATK dealing 7x120% ATK of Ice DMG. Affected enemies attacking the wielder for the first time within 8.0s suffer 30% Total DMG Reduction debuff for that attack.

skills.name: Goddess of Winter
skills.description: Character gains 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier. Argent Knight: Artemis equip bonus: Hits on enemies with Hypothermia recover 2.00 SP. CD: 4.0s.
